com.cc.systems

Class Chassis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cc.systems.Chassis

  • public class Chassis
extends Object
    This class represents the chassis of the robot and is responsible for moving the robot.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getGyro()
      Returns the angle of the gyro in radians on the chassis.
      static Chassis getInstance()
      Returns the singleton object of the Chassis.
      void holoDrive(double fwd, double sld, double rot)
      Moves the robot using the mecanum wheels given a forward, slide, and rotation value.
      void move(double distance, double speed)
      Moves the robot a given distance at a given speed autonomously.
      void relativeHoloDrive(double fwd, double sld, double rot)
      Moves the robot based on the mecanum system given a forward value, a slide value, and a rotation value.
      void resetGyro()
      Resets the gyro on the robot to 0 degrees.
      void square(double speed)
      Line the Robot up with the wall.
      void stop()
      Stops all the motors on the chassis.
      void turn(double angle, double speed)
      Turns the robot at a given angle.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Chassis getInstance()
        Returns the singleton object of the Chassis.
        Returns:
        The singleton object of the chassis.

      • holoDrive

        public void holoDrive(double fwd,
             double sld,
             double rot)
        Moves the robot using the mecanum wheels given a forward, slide, and rotation value.
        Parameters:
        fwd - The forward value from a driver.
        sld - The slide value from a driver.
        rot - The rotation value from a driver.

      • relativeHoloDrive

        public void relativeHoloDrive(double fwd,
                     double sld,
                     double rot)
        Moves the robot based on the mecanum system given a forward value, a slide value, and a rotation value. Moves relative to driver instead of the starting position.
        Parameters:
        fwd - The forward value from a driver.
        sld - The slide value from a driver.
        rot - The rotation value from a driver.

      • getGyro

        public double getGyro()
        Returns the angle of the gyro in radians on the chassis.
        Returns:
        The angle of the gyro in radians.

      • resetGyro

        public void resetGyro()
        Resets the gyro on the robot to 0 degrees.

      • move

        public void move(double distance,
        double speed)
        Moves the robot a given distance at a given speed autonomously.
        Parameters:
        distance - The distance in inches for the robot to travel.
        speed - The speed the robot will travel.

      • turn

        public void turn(double angle,
        double speed)
        Turns the robot at a given angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle that the robot will turn in degrees.

      • square

        public void square(double speed)
        Line the Robot up with the wall.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed at which to square the robot.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops all the motors on the chassis.
